title: Tapa cloth women and ephemeral materials

content.question: Tapa cloth is traditionally made by women in Polynesia because

choices.label: women work together on the cloth during times of mourning
women make the cloth as part of female initiation ceremonies
women’s arts are produced for use during childbirth to ensure successful delivery
women’s arts are associated with soft and ephemeral materials

content.answer: women’s arts are associated with soft and ephemeral materials
